Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-46981 affecting package redis for versions less than 6.2.17-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-46981 affecting package redis for versions less than 6.2.17-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package redis is earlier than 6.2.17-1, affected by CVE-2024-46981
